body:
I found this translation of author's comment: "I drew a sailor suit for the first time in a while. It's been two years since then. I skipped it for so long that I forgot how to draw a sailor suit.

Fortunately, I'm fine with no corona. How long will the corona last?
I have a lot of worries.

Recently, my interest in anime has diminished probably because of my age. I haven't seen any in quite some time. It's dangerous. Why can I read manga?

I've been playing games for a while. Witcher 3, Sakunahime, Earth Defense Force 5 and so on.

See you again. "
